data.name: Manish
data.objective: Innovative Front End Developer seeking challenging opportunities Where I can fully use my skills and learn new as well for the success of myself and the organization.

graduation.institute: PC Training Institute, IGNOU, New Delhi.

experience.job: Currently Working as an Front End Developer at Procloudware Solutions Pvt. Ltd., Amritsar, Punjab.

projects.title: To-Do-List Application
projects.description: Here you can add the tasks you want to do by giving the input, Delete the created tasks, and edit the same as well.

projects.title: Guitar Store
projects.description: It is a like an E-commerce Website where you have different types of Guitar's to choose from.You can buy any Guitar by clicking on Buy Button and than filling your details.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
projects.description: It's a two player game where you have to choose either 'O' or 'X' if you make a series horizontally or vertically before the other player you will win and a Game restart button (so you can restart the game again) and an alert will appear showing "Player 'O' or 'X' Won".

projects.title: Angular Tutorial
projects.description: Here i used fake API (reqres) for Login ,if your name and ID matches the data got from API call, you gets logged-in else an error message will appear and you will be prompted to Sign-up,after Signing-up your details will get saved in an object got from API call and than you can login. After login a tutorial page (like tutorials point or w3 School) will appear where on left side of page logged-in user details will appear and below that you can see list of topics ,as you click on any topic it will scroll to the content related to that and as you click on the content you can edit that and a redo and save button will appear. So, that you can redo or save the changes you made(changes will get saved in LocalStorage),or you simply can logout.

projects.title: CV-Angular:
projects.description: Here i created a CV-Project where you can see my Educational ,professional and other details.

hobbies: Going for a Walk in evening.
